response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession but a testament to craftsmanship and dedication. I am offering it to you at a special price of $20,000, which I believe reflects its true worth and the experiences it could bring to you. I trust this investment will yield significant returns for you in terms of both utility and emotional satisfaction. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 20000}
